content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's great to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite satisfactory. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm interested in the apartment, but I'm a student and I'm looking for a fair price. Can you tell me what the lowest rent you would consider is?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: As a landlord, I'm always looking to get the best deal for my property. I would consider a rent of 1000 Euro per month to be a fair price for this apartment. It's a great location and a brand new building, so I think it's a reasonable offer. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate the offer, but as a student, I'm on a tight budget. Would you be willing to lower the price a bit? Maybe we can find a more student-friendly rate.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand that as a student, you may have budget constraints. However, the location and quality of the apartment are quite desirable, which is why I've priced it at 1000 Euros per month. If you're unable to meet this price, perhaps we should look for a tenant who can appreciate the value of this property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see your point. The location and quality are indeed very attractive. How about 900 Euros per month? I think that would be a fair compromise given my student status.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 900 Euros per month is still not a price that reflects the value of this apartment. I'm sorry, but I cannot accept that. If you're unable to pay the fair market price of 1000 Euros, I suggest we end the negotiation here.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, and I appreciate the time you've spent with me. However, I'm also on a tight budget as a student. If we cannot find a price that works for both of us, then perhaps it's best to look for another apartment that better fits my financial situation. Thank you for your time, and I hope we can part on good terms.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: You're welcome, Max. I'm sorry that we couldn't reach an agreement. If you do find an apartment that suits your needs, I wish you the best. Goodbye.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your time and effort. Goodbye. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
